tripleplay.anim.Animation.Action

    Package Description
    tripleplay.anim  

    • Uses of Animation.Action in tripleplay.anim

      Methods in tripleplay.anim that return Animation.Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.action(Runnable action)
      Creates an animation that executes the supplied runnable and immediately completes.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.add(playn.scene.GroupLayer parent, playn.scene.Layer child)
      Adds the supplied child to the supplied parent.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.addAt(playn.scene.GroupLayer parent, playn.scene.Layer child, float x, float y)
      Adds the supplied child to the supplied parent at the specified translation.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.addAt(playn.scene.GroupLayer parent, playn.scene.Layer child, pythagoras.f.XY pos)
      Adds the supplied child to the supplied parent at the specified translation.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.dispose(react.Closeable dable)
      Disposes the specified disposable.
      <T> Animation.Action AnimBuilder.emit(react.Signal<T> signal, T value)
      Emits value on signal.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.increment(react.Value<Integer> value, int amount)
      Increments (or decrements if amount is negative} an int value.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.play(Playable sound)
      Plays the supplied clip or loop.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.play(playn.core.Sound sound)
      Plays the supplied sound.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.reparent(playn.scene.GroupLayer newParent, playn.scene.Layer child)
      Reparents the supplied child to the supplied new parent.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.setDepth(playn.scene.Layer layer, float depth)
      Sets the specified layer's depth to the specified value.
      <T> Animation.Action AnimBuilder.setValue(react.Value<T> value, T newValue)
      Sets a value to the supplied constant.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.setVisible(playn.scene.Layer layer, boolean visible)
      Sets the specified layer to visible or not.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.stop(Playable sound)
      Stops the supplied clip or loop.
      Animation.Action AnimBuilder.stop(playn.core.Sound sound)
      Stops the supplied sound from playing.
